sections.title: Storm Kindler (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Storm Kindler class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Oceanic Spirit (Su) (Storm Kindler)
sections.description: Provides bonuses to Fly and Swim checks equal to class level, immunity to concentration checks from natural weather, and scaling electricity and sonic resistance.

sections.title: Seasight (Su) (Storm Kindler)
sections.description: Allows seeing through fog, smoke, obscuring vapors, and underwater silt as if they don't exist.

sections.title: Storm Shape (Su) (Storm Kindler)
sections.description: Transform into a whirlwind (or vortex underwater) as a standard action, with variable height and ability to damage and trap creatures of specific sizes.

sections.title: Aura of Calm (Su) (Storm Kindler)
sections.description: Provides allies within range increased effective size against wind effects and competence bonuses on saves against air and water descriptor spells.

sections.title: Wave Breaker (Su) (Storm Kindler)
sections.description: Grants a swim speed equal to twice base land speed and the ability to breathe water for a limited time per day.

sections.title: Thunderstruck (Su) (Storm Kindler)
sections.description: Provides complete immunity to the deafened condition.

sections.title: Weather’s Fury (Su) (Storm Kindler)
sections.description: Adds scaling electricity damage (whirlwind) or cold damage (vortex) to storm shape attacks against creatures that fail their Reflex saves.

sections.title: Eye of the Storm (Su) (Storm Kindler)
sections.description: Grants immunity to non-magical wind and wave damage, plus insight bonuses to AC and saves against air and water descriptor effects.

sections.title: Fickle Winds (Sp) (Storm Kindler)
sections.description: Activates fickle winds spell protection as a swift action for a limited number of rounds per day.

sections.title: Echoing Thunder (Su) (Storm Kindler)
sections.description: Redirects resisted electricity or sonic damage to another creature within 30 feet as an immediate action.

sections.title: Storm Mastery (Su) (Storm Kindler)
sections.description: Grants at-will storm shape, permanent fly speed, aquatic subtype, amphibious quality, and eliminates underwater combat penalties.
